title.value: Productivity of perennial legume grasses in conditions of Poozerye region [Belarus]
Продуктивность многолетних бобовых трав в условиях Поозерья [Беларусь]

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Govorova, T.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the productivity and quality of perennial legumes and gramineous grasses (alfalfa (Medicago sativa) of Buduchynya variety; meadow clover (Trifolium pratense L.) of Vitebchanin variety; and awnless brome (Bromopsis inermis)) in Poozerye region. Protective role of alfalfa and its advantage over meadow clover and positive influence of foliar molybdenum dosing on permanent grasses crop capacity is registered. The dependence of potassium, calcium, magnesium content in plants from mineral fertilizer is ascertained. Resarcg results showed that in case of continuous cropping of alfalfa on the background of P60K120 in course of 6 years the average annual productivity was 109 centner /ha of dry matter with the protein content at the 17% level. Foliar fertilizing with molybdenum provided further increasing of its productivity. In course of 6-year studied alfalfa made it possible to increase humus content in an arable soil layer on 0.25%.
